thread.title: One of our favorite hotels in the world
thread.title_full: One of our favorite hotels in the world - Review of The Soho Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: lisahchristian
title: One of our favorite hotels in the world
text: We've been fortunate enough to do quite a bit of traveling, and this hotel is one of our favorites in the world. In fact, when we returned to London, instead of branching out and trying a new place, we ended up staying at Soho Hotel for a second time. It's super chic, modern, luxurious, and swanky, yet inviting. Our favorite area is the bar/breakfast area. The decor is quite lovely, as is the overall vibe of the place. Additionally, the drinks are incredible (try a bloody mary...best we've ever had) and the food and service are both on point. The location is also fabulous as you're a quick walk to a ton of pubs, and not too far from public transportation. Would definitely recommend!
